Uses of Package
game

  • Packages that use game 
    Package Description
    game  
    gui  
  • Classes in game used by game 
    Class and Description
    Board
    A Board represents a game state.
    BoardElement
    Interface BoardElement can be implemented by any class that wants to be drawn on the GUI in ShippingGame.
    Colorable
    A colorable object is an object that has a color field in the game.
    Edge
    Class Edge in ShippingGame allows creation of the connections between Nodes along which Trucks can travel.
    Game
    Class Game is the controlling class for the ShippingGame Project.
    GameRunner.GameScore
    A holder for a run on a single game.
    GameRunner.GameStatus
    Different results of a game.
    Manager
    Class Manager determines the the behavior of the Trucks.
    Manager.Notification
    Message options from a truck to a manager include the following.
    Node
    A Node (vertex) on the board of the game.
    Parcel
    Class Parcel represents a carriable and deliverable package in the game.
    Truck
    CLass Truck is a runnable object that represents a single Truck in the game.
    Truck.Status
    The Two states that a Truck can be in at any time - either Waiting (staying on its location and awaiting further travel instructions) or Traveling (currently moving from node to node according to its travel instructions).
    UserData
    Classes that implement the UserData interface allow the user to store data in them.
    Vector
    A simple geometric vector class (a la Point), which allows doubles for its fields
  • Classes in game used by gui 
    Class and Description
    BoardElement
    Interface BoardElement can be implemented by any class that wants to be drawn on the GUI in ShippingGame.
    Game
    Class Game is the controlling class for the ShippingGame Project.
    Parcel
    Class Parcel represents a carriable and deliverable package in the game.
    Vector
    A simple geometric vector class (a la Point), which allows doubles for its fields
